title: Retracer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player to track to another
- During the day, guess who they visited

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You only ever learn who your target visited if they visited you or a dead player.
- You can attack player corpses and if you do, your role is outed to everybody and who you are
- Once you've killed two players, you walk away from the town in victory.
- Immune to control and roleblock
- Your attack is dealt at the start of the night, going through

desc:
Post 5404
*Look at those steps... somebody doesn't seem happy. OH! and look at those ones! oh, they killed that person, must be the sk!*
